title: Best Customer Service Ever!!!
text: I decided to order this bed because the reviews were so good. I actually ordered two beds a queen and full size bed. As others have said the mattress was delivered separate from the bed frame. When FedEx was suppose to deliver the bed frames they only delivered the full size bed frame. So I immediately got in contact with SilkDawn. Mark from SilkDawn quickly launched an investigation into the lost bed frame. Mark kept in contact with me about the investigation but after a week they decide to send another bed frame via UPS. The bed frames are very heavy and I had someone bring them up two lifts of stairs. The bed is so comfortable I have not slept this well in years ... maybe ever.  The  gel foam mattress is so comfortable and I love the easy to use remote and the massage feature.  Even after the deliver glitch, I gave the bed five stars because the customer service was great.

title: Best Sheets I’ve ever bought!
text: I’m 63, a sheet snob.  Once I purchased 5 different sets of sheets to find something I could sleep with.  I finally settled on a target brand that was pretty good.  I thought that was the best there was.  It didn’t seem to matter if it was 1200 count or 350.  Sometimes the higher thread counts were still abrasive to me.  Since I’ve found these sheets on Amazon I’m absolutely thrilled to climb into bed.  They are so smooth and comfortable.  A little lightweight but that has grown on me.  These sheets feel so comfortable I’m never going to try another brand again.  Try them.  You won’t be disappointed!

title: NOT COTTON SHEETS
text:
These are misleading. They’re not cotton sheets, they’re microfiber. Granted, they’re nice microfiber sheets, but I can get sheets like this for half the price.

Inside the package is a card that’s double-sided and shows cotton sheets and microfiber sheets. There are no tags or indicators as to what the sheets actually are. It’s just super deceptive.

I’m returning these and getting real cotton sheets.

Like others have said in their reviews, I can’t believe Amazon is allowing these sellers to continue advertising these sheets the way they are-it’s misleading.

title: These Are so Soft
text: I love these sheets. I've been sleeping on them for a few weeks now and they are definitely the softest sheets I've ever slept with. They call them cooling sheets and I sleep hot so that was a factor in my buying them. I think they are OK in that. Probably the best a sheet could be expected to be. I can't really fix the way my body works with a magical sheet but I did get a light comforter, these sheets and a new cotton mattress pad to try to help and I think all together they help. But the softness of these sheets is the real star factor of them, I love them!

title: It is a great buy
text:
I have been using this sheet for a month. So far it has been great. Here is my opinion.

Pros:
------

- Softness
- It has held up very well.
- Excellent Customer Service from the seller.
- Cost (really good bargain).
- Feels breathable

Cons:
------

- Minor nitpick: I could not find any information on the kind of fabric.
- Even Minor Nitpick: Would love some more shades of white: ivory, cream.

For the price you cannot go wrong. Get one.

title: Very comfortable, non-binding
text: I was disappointed when I first took these sheets out of the package, as they are very thin.( I put them on the bed on top of my old patterned sheets and could see the pattern straight through them.) That said, they are very comfortable, non-binding, and silky to sleep on. I am curious about how well they will last and whether they will pill with multiple washings. For now, aside from a slightly cheap look, I rate them a solid 4.5 out of 5, for price and comfort. So far, a great buy for the money.

title: Eh.....returning....hate them.
text:
I just do NOT like these at all. I thought I would try the microfiber due to all of the amazing reviews but I can't stand these sheets. The fabric is so thin....I can see a hint of the mattress pad through the fitted sheet.
I hate the feel of the fabric and have decided to just get 100% cotton. I do not see how these are cooling at all. I've only had them in my hand and feel them becoming too warm. I was spoiled by Pottery Barn sheets and will just save up the money to get a new set.

title: Not Cooling - Stretch Out Easily
text: I bought these because of the sheer number of high reviews and am so surprised at how much I dislike them. First of all, they are not cooling in the least. They are very warm - I often wake up drenched in sweat. Secondly, they do not hold their shape and stretch incredibly easy, so they are constantly needing to be stretched back over the bed which is very disruptive and uncomfortable. I really hoped to liked these, but unfortunately we'll have to find something else and toss these.

title: DON’T BUY!!! THESE ARE EXTREMELY POOR QUALITY!!! 😠
text: I purchased these sheets based on the huge number of positive reviews.  When I opened the package, I felt them and couldn’t wait to put them on my bed.  They were SO soft.  As I took them out, they felt paper thin though.  I gave them the benefit of doubt though.  Shortly after as I later put them on my bed, I discovered a HUGE tear in the corner of the fitted sheet.  Unfortunately, you get what you pay for in this case.  This purchase was terribly disappointing! ☹️

title: Very soft but also very cheap quality
text: I sorted by most expensive sheets because I wanted quality sheets on my bed and so these sheets came up.  The price was still relatively low to what I expected for high end sheets, but unfortunately you get what you pay for.  The sheets are soft but VERY thin and just don't have the quality I was looking for - but I have lofty standards and expected much more.  Unfortunately, it appears you have to go outside Amazon to find high end sheets.

title: great sheet set for the price
text: Sheet set washes great.  It fits wonderfully.  I've paid three times this price and ended up with bottom sheets that didn't fit well, and top sheets that weren't wide enough to tuck.  I didn't like the pillow cases, but for this price I can manage.  They appear to be made to tuck the open end in, but it doesn't work.  Having said that, they look very pretty, are just as comfortable as the $100 sets, and fit better.  I will buy them again!

title: These is some good sheets
text: My wife made a comment about our sheets not being very comfortable and the new mattress sleeping hot. So I did what any good red blooded American would do to make his wife happy and ordered new sheets and a new mattress pad cover thing. She’s happy with the sheets. They are comfy and soft. I don’t know what else to say about sheets. Either you like the sheets you or you don’t. We like these and think you might, too.

title: Super soft, cool and comfortable!
text: The white sheets just arrived yesterday. I washed them and used them last night. Packaging was good. They washed well. Label says no bleach, which is a bummer since they are white and at some point I would think a touch of bleach would be helpful. But in any case, they felt great to sleep in! Soft, light weight, cool. I slept great in them. Very much like upscale hotel sheets to me. Highly recommend.

title: Perfect 👍
text: [[VIDEOID:31845d41b6916a4110467c5cf296da8]] Lady's 😊 I gotta tell ya ! These Sheets are the best , they are so soft and fit nice ! The best sheets Ive have ever gotten 😇I bought these and a nother set and let me tell you that the other set does not even compare to these ! You want a nice soft bed , then these sheets are going to change your comfort of sleeping 😀We felt like we had a whole new bed ❤

title: Great quality for a very reasonable price!
text: The quality of these sheets is great considering the very reasonable pricing.  I have paid more in the past for sets that turned out to be no better (and often poorer) in regard to construction.  They are silky feeling and lightweight, so great for providing a comfortable night's sleep even during heat waves.  They also are very resistant to wrinkles.  This is actually the 2nd set I have purchased.

title: Unbelievably comfy cozy
text:
Purchased these for our guest bedroom, which has only seen 1 family member in the past 2 years. We needed to upgrade the sheets but didn't see the need to drop $100 USD on something that would rarely be used. Turns out these sheets are so soft and comfortable that we ordered another set for a King size bed in the master suite.

The quality looks great and the price is a no brainer.

title: Best Buy
text: I bought set of three different colors I am so happy with this product as the colors are fast materials are very soft I love to touch and lay on it plus it’s not thin fabric the oval all quality is good very satisfied with my purchase the price is reasonable. Plus the vendor is very cooperative I had a missing pillow cases they responded to my email right away and send me the missing pieces.

title: Good Sheets
text:
These sheets are very soft and nice - they are a pleasure to sleep in. Had an initial issue with the sheets shedding but the seller immediately contacted me and remedied the situation. Great customer support!

I would wash them a couple of times to avoid the initial issue I had - cold water only, gentle cycle, and air dry thereafter (do not put in the dryer, the heat is bad).

title: Okay sheets but developed a smell
text: I've had these sheets for about 10 months, and a few months ago, they developed a smell. It's like a stench that I can't wash out, and it makes any other clothes I wash with it smell just as bad. I even put dryer sheets in the cabinet that I keep the sheets, just in case that was a cause, but that didn't help. I like the sheets themselves, but the smell makes them not worth keeping.

title: Have been sleeping very well in these!
text: So far, I like these sheets since I find them very soft. And comfortable. Never thought that having the right bed sheets could affect your overall sleep like this. I would like to update this after the first wash later this week but in having these for 2 nights so far.... I am very happy with my purchase and it seems that the material will hold up well after washing and drying!

title: Material sheds and doesn’t last long
text: The bottom sheet has little balls of shedding lint. I always wash new items before using. There was a lot of lint in the dryer screen the first two washings. The sheets are soft, no wrinkles, and fits nice… BUT I had forgot I had ordered these before and the bottom sheet didn’t last a year before they wore out. This one is following suit. I don’t recommend them for daily use.

title: Pure perfection
text: My daughter pays over $250.00 for premium bamboo sheets.  I visited my sister this past November and she had these sheets and they felt equivalent to my daughter’s sheets!  My sister shared her Amazon link and I could NOT be happier!!!  These are the absolute BEST sheets I have ever owned!  They are SO soft and made well.  I will be buying another set soon!

title: I like the feel but…
text: Tiktok recommended these sheets and I won’t purchase anything else based off a tiktoker. Like all other sheets I purchase, I wash them. Imagine my surprise when I washed them,the flat sheet and pillowcases had strings hanging from them. I purchased a $15 set from Walmart and didn’t have this issue. I’m VERY disappointed. Never again!

title: Comfy Cool sheets!
text: Love these sheets! They are so soft!  They are a bit thin but I like it that way as I feel they are more breathable. No wrinkles!  Deep pocket bottom sheet.  Most importantly, for me, they stay cool.  The spot where you are, warms up nice but when you need a cool spot, it is there!  Great sheets, and amazing price!  Highly recommend.

title: These sheets are dreamy 😴💤
text:
I’ve purchased several of these sheet sets 💕
They’re softer than Egyptian cotton! They’re breathable, with a subtle satiny sheen. So far I’ve purchased both white and sea foam green. After several washes they loose some of their shine, but increase in softness!! They are wrinkle free and so far I haven’t noticed any stains.

title: They fit perfectly even after washing.
text: I am most impressed by the fact that these sheets fit. I have purchased sheets in the past that's a deep pocket that never fit my mattress; It's a double pillow top queen. Putting them on the bed was easy and unlike others I purchased before that said wrinkle free these really were wrinkle free. I would definitely buy them again.

title: Soft but really, really thin
text: We got the sheets for a guest room bed so it's not like they would be used on a daily basis but, these are very, very thin. That was my reason for the 4, instead of 5, stars. I will say they came out of the dryer wrinkle-free and looking nice and they're definitely soft. I just hope they last a long time since they're so thin.

title: Good but pillow cases are very big
text:
The sheets are very soft and the fitted sheet works well. They're not wrinkle free though (I don't really mind).
The pillow cases are very big, I have bought 3 different pillows and none fits, which is unconfortable because it feels slippery. I would recommend them only if you make sure your pillows fit the cases.

title: Brown/Green Stains 🤢
text: Pregnant and exhausted - I skipped washing these sheets and was putting them on the bed when I noticed these brown green stains in multiple spots on the sheets. Ick. Out of curiosity I leaned in to sniff and was instantly sick. Lesson learned to always wash before handling and to not order from this company again.

title: Cool, soft and oh so light!
text: I love these sheets. I had previously used cotton but I live in Florida and they seemed so heavy. These are wonderfully cool and light. I will never go back to cotton after using these wrinkle free sheets. I always shied away from micro fiber but not anymore!! I am going to buy a second set.

title: Love these sheets!
text: Wow, after only being able to use a certain brand of sheets made for a certain number bed that was way overpriced. I will say these sheets are so soft!! I can’t believe it. For the last ten years I was forced to spend money on overpriced uncomfortable sheets. I’m buying a spare right now!

title: Best sheets
text: I just ordered my fourth set of this sheet. Softest, cooling no wrinkles .  So comfortable. I had a weekend guest who was so happy with them she ordered a set while visiting.  Two other friends also ordered them after I showed how soft they are.  I am totally satisfied with my purchases.

title: Cheap material
text: Very thin and cheap looking. I bought the set because of a tik toc video and washed them right away so I couldn't return the set. The package doesn't have the thread count. I can buy 750 thread count sheets on black friday or Costco has nice ones. Do not recommend even for the price.

title: Super soft and luxurious
text: For the price I thought these would not be high-quality sheets, but they are some of the best sheets I’ve owned at any price. I’ve already bought a second set for my guest bedroom and will probably be ordering another back-up set. Absolutely love them and can recommend very highly.

title: Super soft sheets!
text: I actually found these sheets when we were recently staying at a VRBO property. The first nights rest there was awesome and the sheets were so soft, I decided to investigate to buy some for myself. These are thin, lightweight, cool and super soft. Will definitely buy more sets.

title: Just ok for cheap sheets
text: I don't like that they come with instructions to ONLY WASH IN COLD WATER!  Sheets especially white ones I always wash in warm water so they have shrunk significantly. I also wish the detail on the pillow cases were also on the top sheet. The sheets tend to always look wrinkled

title: The softest sheets ever!
text: These sheets are incredibly soft and comfortable. The fitted sheet has deep pockets that wrap under the mattress (no corners popping out). They look and feel like expensive, luxurious sheets, but at a fraction of the cost. I like them so much that I’ve ordered 2 more sets.

title: So soft
text:
I’m a sheet lover, so this is an honest 100% review. These sheets are so good! The more you wash them, the softer they get.
If you are one who needs wrinkle free sheets, these aren’t for you, though. They wrinkle even if you get them out of the dryer immediately.

title: Like sleeping in Kleenex and not in a good way
text: Bought these because of the reviews.  The people who raved about this set must never have slept on quality sheets.  This set is flimsy and wispy, and yes, soft to a degree, but not orgasmically soft.  One night and they are going in the rag bag.  Don't waste your money!!

title: Oil slick on sheet set
text: My first purchase was a set of the Coral Queen sheets. I liked them so much I decided to order a blue set. Unfortunately when I opened the blue set there was a oil slick on the sheets and pillowcases. I'm currently washing them and praying that comes out. What a bummer.

title: Very soft and comfy!
text: These sheets are great so far! They fit on my mattress with a memory foam pad on top, so very deep pockets. I love how soft they are.  They're kind of thin, but we'll see if that is an issue later.  No rips in over a week. You can't go wrong for that price point.

title: Product came in damaged
text: Received these sheets today and they came in damaged. The sheets looked dirty, used, stained, and had a really strong smell to it. Didn’t even attempt to open based on the looks of it from the outside. Packaging wasn’t even wet or damaged just the actual sheets.

title: Poor quality
text: These felt very soft and as I unfolded them I was hopeful, but even before I finished taking it out of the package I discovered that the edging thread on the flat sheet was unraveling in the package! I'm not interested in sheets that come already falling apart.

title: Good at first.
text: These are super soft and fit well, but unfortunately after a few washes, they do not wash well and get little cotton balls on them.  won't buy again.  Great customer service and made things right by me and gave me a refund.  I'm appreciative and very grateful.

title: Disappointed in the quality
text:
Disappointed in the quality. Pillow cases have strings hanging on them...poor sew job.
I have guests and no time to return, otherwise I would.
And these are not loose strings, they are sewn in. I washed them one time, today, when I received them.

title: NOT COTTON - they are Microfiber (plastic)
text: Complete rip off. The only reason people buy these is because they think they are cotton. They are not cotton. Microfiber (polypropelyn plastic) sheets like these cost about $12. And no one wants them because they suck and probably make you sick in 20 years.

title: Soooooo comfortable.
text: This is the 3rd set of these sheets I ordered. Denim, white, navy. So soft and  comfortable. Our new condo has smaller  stackable  washer and dryer and the king set washes beautifully  along with other laundry.  You cannot beat these for value and softness.

title: Sooooo SOFT!!!!!!
text: We ordered these sheets after ready so many positive reviews. We run 2 Airbnbs and these sheets are perfect for guests to feel like they are in a high end hotel, but the best part is that they are EXTREMELY affordable!!! Love Love Love these sheets!!!!

title: I love the sheets, but..
text: The sheets are Exactly as described, but like these and others I have bought, I just wish they would stay somewhat in place. Kudos to a company that comes out with those kind sheets, or if they are out there, please let me know… Thank you

title: Comfortable, cool, luxurious
text: The sheets are some of the best quality I've ever purchased especially not being able to see and feel it beforehand. I did not get hot/sweat overnight and we're in triple digit temperatures. Highly recommend. Will be getting another set

title: Did I receive the same product as everyone else?
text: Not sure how these sheets got so many high ratings. I’ve had these sheets for a week and the fabric has created these little tiny white balls of fabric that shred everywhere. I haven’t stopped vacuuming. Throwing away these sheets ASAP!

title: Amazingly soft!
text: I love these sheets. We live in Montana and it gets down to 30 and 40s at night during summer time and colder in winter.  They’re buttery soft and super warm. They’re exactly what I wanted! I bought two pairs and will be buying more!

title: Perfecta,muy suave y fresca
text: No acostumbro a hacer muchas reseñas  pero este juego de sábanas las merece,  es muy suave al tacto,lo compré de color blanco y es verdaderamente increíble  no puedo decir de su resistencia a las manchas pk aún no las tiene,gracias

title: Very soft! Very deep pockets!
text: I washed these sheets and they sat in the dryer over night. Even after that, they were barely wrinkled. The bed these sheets are on has a thick mattress with a thick mattress topper on it and the beet pockets were plenty deep!

title: These Sheets get RAVE Reviews from my Guests!
text: I am an Airbnb host and most of my guests comment on how soft these sheets are.  They fit perfectly (appreciate the tags marking TOP/BOTTOM) and I've washed them MANY times and they are holding up well.  I will purchase again!

title: These Sheets get RAVE Reviews from my Guests!
text: I am an Airbnb host and most of my guests comment on how soft these sheets are.  They fit perfectly (appreciate the tags marking TOP/BOTTOM) and I've washed them MANY times and they are holding up well.  I will purchase again!

title: Seams fell apart after first wash
text: The product looks and feels cheap. I washed right out of package and saw that the seams fell apart on fitted sheet after first wash. Bought a few months ago and just opened brand new… Too late to return now. Very disappointed.

title: AMAZING Quality
text: These feel just as amazing- if not more than my $150 set of sheets. Even my husband asked "how expensive were these!?" upon getting into bed the night I put them on. If you are looking for luxery on a budget, look no further!

title: Off to a good start, and then…
text: These sheets were very soft and comfortable, then I noticed these the second night. I’ve washed them three times now and still they shed after sleeping in them. Not sure how long I’ll keep these before they are used as rags.

title: Off to a good start, and then…
text: These sheets were very soft and comfortable, then I noticed these the second night. I’ve washed them three times now and still they shed after sleeping in them. Not sure how long I’ll keep these before they are used as rags.

title: Best sheet set for the price
text: This sheet set is soft, cool, comfortable. Right out of the dryer they are easy to make the bed (not tight on the corners)  mostly wrinkle-free and did I mention soft. We have very hard water but these sheets are wonderful!

title: I can’t believe these are only $30
text:
Hallelujah! After years of sheets that pilled & felt rough, I’m so relieved to find these! I was about to spend $150 on Brooklinen out of sheer frustration. Thrilled to save $$.

They’re really soft- recommend!

title: Amazing sheet set for the price.
text: I use these sheets for my Airbnb property.  I have purchesed them 8 days, and I am still extremely satisified withy them.  The sheets are very soft, don't wrinkle up, and most stains wash out pretty easily with bleach.

title: Disappointed
text: I was disappointed with these sheets after seeing the good reviews.  The sheets barely fit my Queen size bed.  Also, they are so uncomfortable I can’t even use them. They are going into the closet or give them away.

title: So soft!
text: Extremely soft! Good fabric and feel like quality sheets. They also feel cool and not too hot. Came with standard size 2 pillows cases, flat sheet, and fitted sheet. I’m surprised how great these are for the price!

title: You need a better inspection system before you send out product
text: These sheets were horrible . The sewing was like a two year old did it. Puckered everywhere.  I should have returned them. But washed them before I  noticed how bad they were. Could never recommend them to anyone

title: Very linty
text: Washed and dried the sheets. Amount of lint in the dryer filter was ridiculous. Had to wash and dry them again. Still lots of lint. I wonder how long these will last given how much fabric came out in the dryer.

title: Not cotton.  Flashes from static charges when I turn over or pull up the sheet, very disconcerting.
text:
Lots of lint though it isn't cotton. Even with plump-top mattress, queen sheets so oversized they can't be smoothed unless you have access to all four sides.

$20 wasted. One of my worst purchases.

title: So soft and comfy!!
text: Took them right out of the package and put them om the bed. The tag on the side is really helpful so you don't have to decide which way the fitted sheet goes. So soft, can't wait to sleep on them tonight!!

title: Nice, soft, and thin
text: I like these sheets. They are very comfortable. They are thin sheets but I think that will be great for the hot Summer months. Hopefully it will keep my husband from complaining about being hot at night.

title: They’re pretty good sheets
text: I just purchased these and it seems like a good set so far. They’re pretty soft to the touch and it seems like a good purchase so far given the piece. They don’t seem to be all that wrinkle free though.

title: Soft sheets
text: Got these sheets for my queen bed and they are actually nice. The sheets are soft to touch and cool, they are very light and breathable. They are comfortable to sleep in and I’m happy with my purchase.

title: Bad quality
text: Sheets are thin and cheap, the elastic in the fitted sheet is lose and comes off the mattress right away when you sleep on it. The seams look gathered and poorly sewn. Don’t buy this product- terrible!

title: I love it!
text:
What a breeze!
I washed and dried the bed sheets with the blanket only, in a cold cycle and they did not wrinkle. I did not use too much detergent and used more softener.
I am very pleased.

title: Great but thin and slightly transparent
text: Slept great on them and we’re hot sleepers, but you can see through the pillow shams and it which makes it look a little cheap. Other than being slightly transparent, it’s good budget- value sheets

title: Nice but white sheets are very see through
text: They are very soft but see through. I can see the mattress through them. Doesn’t bother me enough to send back but would def put on a diff set for company. These are being used in guest bedroom.

title: very soft and comfortable
text: These sheets are very soft and comfortable  I've only washed one time and they washed up nicely and not a lot of wrinkles  For the price they're quite nice  I will definately order an second set

title: Don't waste your money
text: I bought these based on the reviews...what junk! These sheets are extremely thin and very poor quality... I can see right through them, not worth $5 let alone the $30 plus that I paid for them!

title: I
text: I do not like there sheet sets…they are not good material..they charge you $59 dollars for these no wrinkle free sheets sets…I throw them away..and will never order sheet sets from them again.

title: Not a great product
text: These have been giving me the most sleepless nights, I can't believe how much these sheets make me sweat. After the third night I had to take them off because every night was the same issue.

title: They don’t fit and rip when trying to put them on.
text: Awful - bought these in advance and actually just got a chance to use them.  My mistake - beyond the window to return.  They don’t fit and rip when you try to pull them up.  Save your money.

title: Softest sheets we own
text: I wasn't expecting these to be so soft! They feel like high quality sheets, and they've held up even after quite a few washes already. No stains so far. Would definitely buy these again.

title: Super Soft But…
text: These sheets were so soft and somewhat silky. The only thing I didn’t like was that there was a flaw in the flat sheet. It was like a see-thru type flaw. Other than that, they are nice.

title: Good set of sheets
text: They are soft and pretty much wrinkle free. Take out of dryer as soon as they are dry and place on your bed. I love the extra room with the fitted sheet and the two extra pillowcases.

title: Spoil yourself and luxury
text:
Amazing
absolutely just as good as the highest quality five star hotel sheets I highly recommend them for anyone that wants to spoil themselves in luxury. They are fantastic.

title: Refreshing cool comfortable sheets
text: Looking for 100% cotton sheets. I read to bio on these sheets so I bought them. Just exactly what I wanted. So soft and cool on the body. No night sweats. Wrinkle free from dryer.

title: Amazing sheets at an amazing price!
text: I'm loving these sheets.  The price is very fair.  They do not get hot and they are super soft!  I gave wrinkle-free a 4 because they wrinkle a little, but it's not a big deal.

title: Good sheets for the money
text:
Love the elastic surround for bottom sheet. Fits well with plenty of room to tuck in. soft and comfortable.

only thing that would be better is a bigger pillowcase.

title: So comfy
text: I had a major surgery and wanted some comfy sheets for my recover and these were amazing and didn’t stain! Ordered more just to alternate between washes. Highly recommend

title: Super soft
text: These sheets are soooo soft, not quite wrinkle free but I’m looking for comfort more than looks. I hope they do well over time, if they do I’m buying so many more colors.

title: Really soft
text: Washed these for use after I have my baby at home, so haven’t slept on them yet, but after washing they are so soft, I suspect they will be full of holes not long after.

title: Very comfortable
text: I needed new sheets as I’m getting an apartment soon. These sheets give a luxury look and feels very soft. I compare it to hotel sheets as it feels like the cold sheets.

title: Quality sheets for good price
text: They are a good fit for a deep mattress very soft maintains color no wrinkles . will be purchasing the fall colors shortly may get them all throw out old bring in new!

title: Amazing
text: These are the softest sheets I've ever owned and I usually buy high thread count.  I am in love with the quality.  I immediately ordered a different set.  10 out of 10

title: These sheets were of excellent quality!
text: These hotel luxury sheets were of excellent quality. Washed very well without wrinkling and is soft to the touch. Can't beat the price and quality. Love these sheets!

title: Only one thing wrong with these sheets
text: You will NEVER want to get out of bed. These are crazy soft and luxurious! I will buy these again and again and give as gifts. Wonderful. Very happy with my purchase

title: Good Price
text: These sheets actually fit my bed with ease. I appreciate that they mark top/bottom. They are smooth and comfortable, and the price was right for me. I will buy more.

title: Very soft and comfy!
text: Seem to be nice quality, they are very soft and wash up nicely. I like that they stretch enough to fit over both the mattress and the box springs. Great price also!

title: Best decision!
text: First time buying these! Wanted to wait until I washed them to leave a review. They are truly wrinkle free. Slept amazing! Weren’t hot. My husband liked them too.

title: Super soft!
text: Amazingly soft, I haven’t had it long enough to rate the stain resistant but for the cost, the quality seems to be amazing! A few friends plan to order a set too!
